name: TrueSight Pulse Sine Wave Plugin
description: Plugin that generates multiple sine waves

paramSchema.title: Amplitude
paramSchema.name: amplitude
paramSchema.description: Unitless value of the max value of the sinewave

paramSchema.title: Frequency
paramSchema.name: frequency
paramSchema.description: Frequency in hertz of the sinewave

paramSchema.title: Noise
paramSchema.name: noise
paramSchema.description: Enable noise generation added on the sine wave

paramSchema.title: Sample Rate
paramSchema.name: sample
paramSchema.description: How often (in milliseconds) to collect values from the sinewave.

paramSchema.title: Debug Level
paramSchema.name: debug_level
paramSchema.description: If you are having issues with the plugin, you can enable additional debugging output to be shown in the meter console
